oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Akin Mine employees
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Group portrait of Akin Mine employees taken on the mine grounds. They are posing by a sign that reads: "Congratulations to the Akin Mining Dept. for the splendid safety record / 1000 days without a lost time accident!" Note: this negative was cut in half.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Group portraits; People; Mining
